about.title: About MoodFM
about.content:
MoodFM is an AI-powered music recommender that transforms your emotions into the perfect song. Just type how you feel (in any language), and MoodFM analyzes your mood using natural language processing and finds a song that matches your emotional state.

It was built in under two weeks for the Summer of Making 2025, entirely self-hosted at home. MoodFM is stateless, privacy-respecting â€” no login, no tracking, just music and emotion.

how-it-works.title: How it Works
how-it-works.content: Enter how you feel and MoodFM translates your mood using Google Translate API, analyzes it with AI (Huggingface models), matches it to curated music tags, fetches tracks from Last.fm and major platforms, and lets you share your personalized song with a unique linkâ€”all powered by a privacy-friendly Flask backend and a Vanila JS frontend.
